notes: Rubidium nitrate is a specialty oxidizer and colorant used for red-violet and infrared pyrotechnic compositions; it is more expensive and less common than potassium or strontium salts.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: research / industrial use; may not sell directly to consumers; hazmat shipping likely
procurement_sources.notes: Specialty supplier with multiple rubidium compounds including rubidium nitrate.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: for laboratory use only; business or institutional account often required
procurement_sources.notes: Laboratory reagent supplier offering small bottles of rubidium nitrate.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: research-use-only; hazardous material shipping and regulatory compliance required
procurement_sources.notes: High-purity rubidium nitrate for analytical and research applications.
